role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that adds a sweet set of dotfiles to each user's home directory
role_description_full_overview: This role is the culmination of looking through many different dotfile configurations on GitHub.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that adds a sweet set of dotfiles to each user's home directory.
